basic.Peptide Name: M-lycotoxin-Hc2a (M-LCTX-Hc2a; Lycotoxin-2; Lycotoxin II; spiders, Arthropods, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus thuringiensis subsp. Israelensis (MIC=10-60 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli D31 (MIC<10 µM), Escherichia coli DH5 (MIC<40 µM).Fungi:Candida glabrata ATCC 2001 (MIC=100-150 µM)
